FuncDef: This command applies a maximum packet arrival rate limit (applied per SAP/interface) for the entire SAP/interface, above which packets will be discarded immediately. The rate defined is a global rate limit for the interface regardless of how many traffic flows are present on the SAP/interface. It is a per-SAP/interface rate.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a packet arrival rate limit in packets per second. Values-1 to 65535, max (the max indicates no limit).

ExtraInfo: Default: overall max for cpu-protection-policy-id 1 to 253overall 6000 for cpu-protection-policy-id 254 (default access interface policy)overall max for cpu-protection-policy-id 255 (default network interface policy)
